build.buildCommand: apt-get update && apt-get install -y libclang-dev clang curl && curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | sh -s -- -y --default-toolchain 1.87.0 && . $HOME/.cargo/env && mkdir -p crates/mys-faucet/bin && cargo build --release -p mys-faucet && cp target/release/mys-faucet crates/mys-faucet/bin/ && cp target/release/merge_coins crates/mys-faucet/bin/ && cp crates/mys-faucet/setup-wallet.sh crates/mys-faucet/bin/ && chmod +x crates/mys-faucet/bin/setup-wallet.sh
